Package UI

Class Button

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.AbstractButton
            • javax.swing.JButton
              • UI.Button
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
    public class Button
extends javax.swing.JButton
    A custom JButton with additional features for setting text, tooltip, icon, enabled state, color, background color, and font.
    Since:
    2023-12-01
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Laamiri Ouail
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Button

        public Button​(int left,
              int top,
              int width,
              int height,
              java.lang.String text,
              java.lang.String icon,
              java.lang.String toolTip,
              boolean enable,
              java.lang.String color,
              java.lang.String backgroundColor,
              int fontSize,
              java.lang.String fontFamily,
              boolean isBold,
              boolean isItalic)
        Constructs a Button with specified properties.
        Parameters:
        left - The left position of the Button.
        top - The top position of the Button.
        width - The width of the Button.
        height - The height of the Button.
        text - The text to display on the Button.
        icon - The path to the icon image file for the Button.
        toolTip - The tooltip to display when hovering over the Button.
        enable - Set to true to enable the Button, false to disable it.
        color - The text color in hexadecimal format (e.g., "#RRGGBB").
        backgroundColor - The background color in hexadecimal format.
        fontSize - The font size.
        fontFamily - The font family.
        isBold - Set to true for bold text.
        isItalic - Set to true for italic text.

    • Method Detail

      • setTooltip

        public void setTooltip​(java.lang.String tooltip)
        Sets the tooltip for the Button if the tooltip is not empty.
        Parameters:
        tooltip - The tooltip to set for the Button.

      • resize

        public void resize​(int left,
                   int top,
                   int width,
                   int height)
        Resizes the Button to the specified dimensions.
        Parameters:
        left - The left position.
        top - The top position.
        width - The width.
        height - The height.

      • toEnabled

        public void toEnabled​(boolean enable)
        Sets whether the Button is enabled or disabled.
        Parameters:
        enable - Set to true to enable the Button, false to disable it.

      • setIconButton

        public void setIconButton​(java.lang.String pathToIcon)
        Sets the icon for the Button if the icon file exists.
        Parameters:
        pathToIcon - The path to the icon image file.

      • setColor

        public void setColor​(java.lang.String hexaColor)
        Sets the text color of the Button.
        Parameters:
        hexaColor - The text color in hexadecimal format (e.g., "#RRGGBB").

      • setBackgroundColor

        public void setBackgroundColor​(java.lang.String hexaColor)
        Sets the background color of the Button.
        Parameters:
        hexaColor - The background color in hexadecimal format.

      • setFont

        public void setFont​(int fontSize,
                    java.lang.String fontFamily,
                    boolean isBold,
                    boolean isItalic)
        Sets the font properties for the Button.
        Parameters:
        fontSize - The font size.
        fontFamily - The font family.
        isBold - Set to true for bold text.
        isItalic - Set to true for italic text.

        public java.lang.String getBackgroundColor()
        Gets the background color of the Button.
